data.title: Where The Fuck Am I?
data.info: A mobile app that tells a customer what neighborhood they're currently in or what neighborhood an address is in, without invading their privacy. Currently a work in progress.

data.title: ResponsibleConsumer
data.info: A prototype of a website that would help consumers make informed purchasing decisions by providing ethical scores for companies in a variety of areas including environmental impact, human rights abuses, and more.

data.title: MyMelier
data.stack: Javascript, React Native, Redux, Express, Sequelize
data.info: 'A sommelier in your pocket.' A mobile app built as a group project during my time at the Grace Hopper Program at Fullstack Academy.
